description.value:
Carved of driftwood stained white with the salt of the sea, a pirate staff has jewels and gold pieces embedded in the wood. A skull and crossbones sit on top. When used as a weapon, the staff is a +2 striking fearsome staff. While wielding the staff, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Intimidation checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.tHCqgwjtQtzNqVvd]{Coerce}.

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list.

  • Cantrip @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.dDiOnjcsBFbAvP6t]{Gale Blast}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.tXa5vOu5giBNCjdR]{Know the Way}
  • 1st @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.q5vbYgLztQ04FQZg]{Seashell of Stolen Sound}
  • 2nd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9XHmC2JgTUIQ1CCm]{Mist}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.MZGkMsPBztFN0pUO]{Water Breathing}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Seaah9amXg70RKw2]{Water Walk}
  • 3rd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.fPlFRu4dp09qJs3K]{Mind of Menace}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.MZGkMsPBztFN0pUO]{Water Breathing}
  • 4th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.piMJO6aYeDJbrhEo]{Solid Fog}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Seaah9amXg70RKw2]{Water Walk}
  • 5th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.zCLyETFoPqCQXLVy]{Flowing Strike}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.z2mfh3oPnfYqXflY]{Mariner's Curse}

Craft Requirements Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells.
